headline: Why Cummins (CMI) is Poised to Beat Earnings Estimates Again

headline: Aperia Halo速 Tire Inflator Shows Fuel Savings in MVTS Testing
summary: MVT Solutions (MVTS), a provider of breakthrough fuel economy testing and design and development services for the trucking industry, today announced that Aperia Technologies' Halo速 Tire Inflator achieved a fuel saving of 1.19gal/1000 miles in track testing.
